tldr: 本文提出了一种部署无人机作为移动空中中继（AR）的解决方案，将单天线用户分成两组，并使用优化的多用户波束成形方法，以应对未知通道状态信息的被动窃听攻击。算法结合了深度强化学习和传统的波束成形方法，可以很好地提高服务用户的安全性。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a solution for tackling the passive eavesdropping problem in wireless communication with attackers' unknown location and channel state information by deploying a UAV as a mobile aerial relay (AR) to support vulnerable users. The solution clusters single-antenna users and applies optimized multi-user beamforming to them. The AR's 3D position, multi-user beamforming matrix, and transmission powers are optimized using a combination of closed-form solutions and machine learning techniques. The algorithm combines deep reinforcement learning with traditional beamforming methods and is shown to improve user security against passive eavesdropping attacks.
